summary.label:
等價交換，策略對戰！

擁有非凡鍊金術天賦的愛力克兄弟，因對過世的母親思念不已，不惜觸犯鍊金術禁忌進行人體鍊成，卻也因此付出殘酷的代價。為了找回在人體鍊成中失去的身體，於是他們踏上了尋找真理的冒險之旅。
為奪回失去的一切，他們將付出怎樣的代價作為交換？會對戰哪些隱密的強大敵人？而真理背後又隱藏著什麼樣的秘密呢？

【原著聲優，傾力獻聲】
超過 40 位日本明星级 CV 助陣，傾力獻聲！全日文語音精彩演繹完整劇情，復刻原汁原味的經典回憶。更有知名聲優水樹 奈々、宮野 真守獻唱遊戲主題曲，讓你暢享聽覺盛宴！

【極致畫面，沉浸體驗】
全新 3D 建模打造流暢細緻的打鬥畫面，再現原著震撼戰鬥劇情；極致細膩的美術風格，在生動光影變化下刻畫人物角色的一舉一動。以最真摯的筆觸塑造愛力克兄弟的旅程中遇到的夥伴與知名場景，讓你沉浸體驗原著跌宕起伏的劇情！

【全新戰棋，玩法升級】
容易上手又不失策略性的新型態戰棋玩法，節奏明快、策略豐富，扭轉你對戰棋的想像。
更有精心設計的全新玩法元素：逃脫、躲避、條件實戰…戰棋的玩法不止有對戰一種！

【布陣走位，策略致勝】
豐富的策略要素提供了足夠的戰場自由度，勝負在戰局變化之間瞬間反轉！
不論是心、體、技、破壞、創造、人理六種屬性相互剋制，或是戰鬥中的地形要素，還是布陣走位，都將是你致勝的關鍵！

【全新外傳，豐富劇情】
以全新視角描繪原作中未能詳述的外傳故事。在豐富的番外支線劇情中，各個人氣角色都將再次登上故事舞台，供你細細品味角色魅力！

【培養本命，組建戰隊】
在旅途中，超人氣角色接續登場，你將邂逅個性各異、能力獨特的夥伴。探索不同角色專屬的戰鬥技能，培養出最強的鍊金術師並組建最佳戰隊！伴隨著與夥伴之間的好感度提升，你還將解鎖的角色語音，了解他們不為人知的一面…

【熱血競技，暢快戰鬥】
PVP 對戰一觸即發，流暢打鬥畫面、華麗的技能效果、流暢的連攜招式讓每一次對戰都酣暢淋漓！熱血戰鬥隨時開打，你敢挑戰成為最頂尖的鍊金術師嗎？

summary.label:
Block Blast: A perfect mix of block and brain Puzzle games, combining creativity with the classics! The simple control, wonderful sound effects, and a great rhythm! Block Blast will leave you wanting more!
 
Aside from the classical brain gameplay, you will also experience a whole new original COMBO gameplay. Drag and drop blocks onto the board to fill a row or column to complete elimination and clearing multiple rows or columns at once will produce a cool elimination animation as well as extra points. The more COMBOs you perform, the more points you get. It is up to your logical skills and layout strategy if you want to score high points. Test your IQ and exercise your brain in Block Blast!
 
Features:
1. Simple and easy to play, suitable for all ages, excellent choice to kill time.
2. No network connection is needed; you can enjoy Block Blast anytime, anywhere.
3. Beautiful blocks and wonderful sound effects will bring you a fantastic gaming experience.
 
How to Play:
1. Drag and drop the blocks onto the board and clear the blocks when a column or row is filled.
2. We will keep providing blocks of various shapes until you have no space left on the board.
3. Plan your next move as you think constantly about what blocks might show up. 
 
How to become a block master:å
1. Instead of waiting for the perfectly shaped blocks, take the opportunity to free up more space and score points.
2. There is no time limit in Block Blast, so think carefully about your every move. 
 
No matter where you are, whether you are tired, bored, or frustrated, Block Blast will always be by your side, sweeping away the boredom and helping you relax and cheer up!

然而在某日，一名少女意外迷失在深山中。茫然無措的少女，機緣巧合之下來到了這扇門前——

Sheep N Sheep is one of the newest tile matching games. Most tile games are suitable for casual entertaining, but also help to relax after stressful studying and working hours. The rules are simple and easy to pick up. All you need is to match 3 tiles with the same vivid picture, for instance, 3 bells or 3 grass. Clear the board from all the tiles to go to the next level.

Matching games can be tricky, but normally they have some common tile connect mechanics. After all, you still need to connect the tiles with pictures, right? Most free tile games have quite similar rules. And here’s ours.

HOW TO PLAY OUR TILES GAME
Well, you should match 3 tiles with the same image. Just tap to put them into the stack. Three same tiles will be matched and removed from the stack.
When you clear the board, you win. Keep practicing to become a real tile master one day.
You fail, if you don't get at least one merge for seven tiles in your stack. Remember: you have a maximum of seven moves to make one combination of three tiles. Each tile link move matters.

Sheep N Sheep FEATURES
► Match Tiles - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. Puzzles start with low difficulty and become challenging fast!
► Super difficult puzzle - only 0.1% of players can solve the puzzle. Are you one of them? Come and challenge yourself!

► Compete with global users - the leaderboard will display the number of players who pass the level in each region, try to pass the level to occupy the top of the leaderboard!
► Create a Calm Experience - Solve addictive yet always evolving tile matching mahjong puzzles in a unique and calm experience.
► Relax and Have Fun - Take your time to solve the puzzles and clear the board. They are simply for your entertainment and will relax your brain.

Enjoy this tile-matching mahjong game, have a moment of peace throughout your day to calm your mind and boost your brain. Sharpen your mind with a series of tile matching levels that gradually increase puzzle difficulty.

Come back to it every day, as there is always a new daily tile matching mahjong puzzle!

從《天鵝湖》、《胡桃鉗》、《鐘樓怪人》等無數經典作品，其和弦音律幻化成「維爾蘭德大陸」風景各異的四個國家：巨龍與神話共舞的春之國；永夜中魔女們竊竊私語的夏之國；因女巫讒言點燃戰火的秋之國；童話在雪中輕輕吟唱的冬之國。彼此間表面上脆弱的同盟，正面臨潛伏在檯面下對立勢力的威脅和詭計。

身為學院的新生指揮，天賦異稟的你，將踏上尋找世界之謎的奇幻旅途。從春夏秋冬四國之中，挖掘諸多來自歌劇世界中的少女，並在你的指揮號令下一同抵禦樂魘侵襲。熱血的冒險之餘，更有輕鬆的宿舍布置，讓指揮與樂姬一起享受學院愜意的休閒時光。

summary.label:
Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

Thus begins your journey across Teyvat to seek answers from The Seven — the gods of each element. Along the way, prepare to explore every inch of this wondrous world, join forces with a diverse range of characters, and unravel the countless mysteries that Teyvat holds...

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

Feast your eyes on the world around you, with a stunning art style, real-time rendering, and finely tuned character animations delivering you a truly immersive visual experience. Lighting and weather all change naturally over time, bringing every detail of this world to life.

SOOTHING SOUNDTRACK

Let the beautiful sounds of Teyvat draw you in as you explore the expansive world around you. Performed by the world's top orchestras such as London Philharmonic Orchestra and Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, the soundtrack changes seamlessly with the time and gameplay to match the mood.

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM

Team up with a diverse cast of characters in Teyvat, each with their own unique personalities, stories, and abilities. Discover your favorite party combinations and level up your characters to help you conquer even the most daunting of enemies and domains.

JOURNEY WITH FRIENDS

Team up with friends across various platforms to trigger more elemental action, tackle tricky boss fights, and conquer challenging domains together to reap rich rewards.

As you stand atop the peaks of Jueyun Karst and take in the rolling clouds and vast terrain stretching out before you, you may wish to stay in Teyvat a little longer... But until you are reunited with your lost sibling, how can you rest? Go forth, Traveler, and begin your adventure!

summary.label:
In Hungry Hearts Diner, be the boss of a small eatery in a quiet
corner of 1970's Tokyo. This casual restaurant management sim
comes jam-packed with story, and you'll have a chance to both
catch up with old friends and meet new faces.

Several years have passed since the events of the previous
Hungry Hearts, and Grandma has just moved back into her
old diner. Life's not all butterflies and apple pies though,
and she has her work cut out for her getting the place back
in tip-top shape. Running a diner by yourself isn't easy,
especially when you've got bills to pay!

...Luckily, Granny here has some help!
You, for one, but also hardworking Sue, her first ever hired hand.
The girl's inexperienced, and she drops more dishes than she dries,
but she's a lifesaver around the shop. Better yet, she's pleased
as peaches to head out into town and run deliveries for you!

But enough of that—you're not here to listen to an old woman
ramble. So, what'll it be? A nice, simple bowl of rice? Or how about
a pipin' hot beef croquette, fresh out of the fryer? This diner serves
just about every classic Japanese dish you can find at your average
local hash house, and the portions are generous to boot.

Stay a while, and Grandma's garrulous manner
will soon have you as chatty as her other regulars.
They're an odd bunch, and they all seem to have their
share of troubles. But after the third bowl of miso soup or so,
they'll open up and reveal their stories, both joyous and sad.

Strap in for an all new set of tales, with some surprising
twists and turns along the way. And remember, everyone's
got that one special meal they can just never forget.

----------------------------------
【Story】
----------------------------------
On a tiny side street in a nameless little neighborhood sits an
old Japanese diner. Things are quiet here; old-fashioned
you might say. But of course they are. It's Showa era Japan,
and the television is just starting to come into vogue.

Come on in, have a seat, and close your eyes.
Thunk thunk goes the steady beat of a knife chopping
veggies. Hisss; the sound of meat sizzling in a pan.
Getting hungry? Good, 'cause the food here's sure to
warm your belly and leave you feeling nice and full.

Besides, the kindly old granny who runs the place needs
all the business she can get. She just opened the diner's
doors the other day, and she's busy as a bee trying to stay
afloat. Managing a successful eatery's no easy task when
you're all by your loneso—huh?

Wait a sec, who's that helping her out in the kitchen?

Welcome to Hungry Hearts Diner!
It's a cozy place, a place where regular folk gather 'round
worn wooden tables for a bite—and maybe some friendly
conversation, too. Here, you'll find food to fill your belly
and stories that'll warm your heart.

Thanks for coming, and we hope you enjoy your meal!
----------------------------------
So, let me guess. The question you're asking yourself right now
is "is this game for me"? Well, maybe it is.
 -Do you like casual/idle games?
 -Do you like games where you run a shop?
 -Are you looking for a nice, relaxing story?
 -Ever played any of our other games, like Oden Cart, Showa Candy Shop, or The Kids We Were? (If so, thanks a bunch!)
 -Are you hungry?*
*Warning: This game is not edible. Please don't try to eat your phone.

If you answered "Yes!!!!" to any of the above, well,
maybe this game's for you. Give it a download and a shot.
It's free, so it won't cost you a dime!
We very much hope it brings you a smile, and along the way,
perhaps even some tears as well.

----------------------------------
English Translation:
Samuel J. Allen
npckc

Simplified Chinese Translation:
Wen Li

Indonesian Translation:
Nita Kusumaningrum
Kresna Luginawati

Localization Director:
Gavin Greene

“太好了，我們終於不用流浪了嗚嗚嗚。”
這是一群在外流浪多年的動物們發自內心的喜悅。
在這裡，你將帶領他們來到一座未開發的島嶼，通過開荒擴土、探索採集、交易經營、拓海跑商，獲取豐富的物資資源，創造出一個充滿自由和童話的夢幻世界。讓動物們不再顛沛流離，從此過上安定自足的生活！

【開闊地圖，裝扮世界】
白雪盡情地揮灑於萬物，無盡的寒意使天地界限逐漸模糊。
澄澈水面映照著櫻花樹，偶然飄落粉色花瓣泛起層層漣漪。
城市擁有建築，工廠，裝飾物等3000餘個。土地和雪地；平面和高層；白天和夜晚；一起都會呈現出不同的唯美意境！
哐當！看我挖到了什麼？世界地圖裡竟然有寶藏，一起來尋寶呀。

【動物養成，圖鑒收集】
城市建設需要招募更多動物，動物專屬特長為工廠生產、拓荒、建築搭建、釣魚等活動線上自己的一份力。但是想讓他們工作的話，必須要住上動物公寓哦。
長頸鹿喜歡和伴侶看日落，所以他在家裡開了兩個天窗探頭欣賞。
企鵝家裡不買電視和冰箱，因為她就是電視，她伴侶就是冰箱。
樹懶是著名的路癡，總找不到回家的路……
獨具個性的動物們在城市裡穿梭遊走，歡迎來撩！

【經營系統，放置玩法】
工廠樹會長出很多美食！有香甜美味的南瓜派、醇香濃郁的咖啡、柔軟酸甜的草莓聖代……把這些食物拿去訂單交易，能獲得大量的金幣和建築材料哦。
另外，眾多訂單裡面有一份特殊的訂單，是熊貓墩墩周遊世界的時候順便帶去交易的。有空可以翻看墩墩的旅行日記，特別有意思。     遊戲的養成系統簡單易上手，升級和解鎖都由玩家自己選擇，等級樹只要放置動物居民研究即可完成升級解鎖。如果想經營好城市，那做好時間管理，合理安排好動物工作！


【共同建設，家園合併】
遊戲設定中有共同建設的玩法。
玩家能委託好友裝飾自己的城市，解鎖家族後能邀請家族成員合併家園島，自由建設共同展現家族的魅力。家族中每個族員都可以通過挖礦、跑商、釣魚、遠征獲得家族貢獻獲得豐富的裝飾資源。


【個性裝飾，自由度高】
玩家角色形象、城市、家園庭院和室內，你都可以進行diy。無論是一條馬路、一張椅子、乃至一棵草，都需要你來搭建。遊戲內室內外裝飾主題應有盡有，室外的瑰麗海洋、夏日海灘、浪漫婚禮……室內的森林風、少女風等等，一鍵解決不會裝飾的煩惱！

最後，跟隨你內心的靈感，按照你的想法，大膽建造屬於你的城市吧！
